text: Obscure rock formations downtown - mini geology lessons during lunch walks!
Rugged coastline views at breakwater – meditative bliss!

Totally get you – there's this petite wharf area where I sometimes chill out after work hours; it overlooks rocky shores shaped by ancient volcanic activity - jutting out quietly amidst modern hustle but serves up some awesome reflective moments!
Heard that! There’s also an unassuming cafe down one of these side streets—you'd miss it if you blinked—feels like coming home every time.
Yep - life's more improv than script! We adapt our “plans” all the time. Financial stability? More like hit-and-miss even when you're past those 30s hurdles!
Roles define less nowadays; geology once dude-heavy but change comes quickworkers_Icarus
Geology's not immune - shaking up norms though!
